top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave

comments_since_last_sample.body: Wish I could like this a million times!! Amazing as always V!
Never expected to be jealous of a doll 😂
As a drummer; listening to the drop NOT happen in this version hurt... a lot... unforgivable sin. But everything else.... fire. no cap
Came in expecting to bad mouth this video (even though I love you & the Bros).  Not gonna lie ... epic twist of a cover on a badass 80s jam.  Impressive.
@Violet Orlandi is the cross a new tat or make up me and my sister cant tell and both like it but kinda "argued" about it btw amazing vid love this song and you take on it
I hink Phil would be pleased . WOW was so good !!!!
Wow this was dark, I know the original is technically a dark song too but this was on a whole different level, what an amazing cover.
The next “Thirsty Dms” video about to go crazy 😂
Cult of chucky, I am everywhere.
Amazing cover. Better than the orginal I dare say.
I'd love to see you do a cover collaboration with Leo Moracchioli over at Frog Leap Studios.
The trigger warning is ghey spoiler
Great bride of Chucky.. also liked staying alive. Super collab on both accounts. Nice new version of classics, metal worthy.
Damn we got a awesome cover and a short film
Another AMAZING video but I have a question Is this the Chucky of $1000 dollars?
🤘🤘❤🤘🤘 Fantastic arrangement on this!!!! Kept the right crux and tone while making it more current!!! And Violet again singing and impacting the soul!!! 😉❤✌🏼
Well im creeped out haha although I haven't seen Chuck in years hmmm and tomorrow is holoween!
Xd quisiera ser el muñeco para que me agarré así
